    saveProgress() - Static method in class gui.Board
    If the hasn't ended but the program still exited, the function saves the board's current state and remove the current mode's name from a list, which keeps track of the gamemodes that have been played this session, so that way it won't delete that gamemode's savefile.

    startGame(String) - Static method in class gui.Board
    Starts up game screen with the selected gamemode If the current session's list doesn't contain the selected gamemode, it gets added to the list If there is a savefile in the saves directory to the selected gamemode, it gets loaded instead of an empty board
